thread.title: BRIEF-Orolia's McMurdo selected as project coordinator by the EC
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Orolia's McMurdo selected as project coordinator by the EC

title: BRIEF-Orolia's McMurdo selected as project coordinator by the EC
text:
BRIEF-Orolia's McMurdo selected as project coordinator by the EC 
Oct 12 Orolia SA : 
* Says its division McMurdo has been selected by the European Commission to lead the development of next-generation search and rescue distress beacons under the Horizon 2020 Research and Innovation Program's HELIOS project 
* Award is expected to be finalized on Dec. 1 
* As project coordinator, McMurdo will receive nearly 2.4 million euros ($2.73 million) of the total HELIOS development budget over the next three years 
Source text: bit.ly/1PpSPLJ Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8797 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
